trans-unit.source: Encapsulates text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler teksten oppsettet informasjon (for eksempel justering, retning og kategorien stopper) viser endringer (for eksempel ellipsen innsetting og national Siffererstatning) og OpenType-funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Many common formats are provided through the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Mange vanlige formater leveres gjennom den <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>opplisting.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: StringFormat objects can be changed.
trans-unit.target: StringFormat objekter kan endres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et nytt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>klassen.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FormatFlags|0 (no flags are set)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | FormatFlags |&0; (ingen flagg defineres) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|</xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from the specified existing <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et nytt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet fra den angitte eksisterende <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from which to initialize the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet som ikke den nye <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: format is .
trans-unit.target: formatis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et nytt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objekt med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplistingen for den nye <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration and language.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et nytt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objekt med angitt <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplisting og språk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplistingen for den nye <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the language of the text.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir språket for teksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett justering av strengen.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> to specify the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>til å angi den loddrette justeringen av strengen.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that specifies the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> opplisting som angir vannrett justering av strengen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object this method creates.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objekt denne metoden oppretter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the language that is used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Henter språket som skal brukes når lokale sifre som brukes i stedet for vestlige sifre.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: En National språket støtte (NLS) språk-IDen som angir språket som skal brukes når lokale sifre som brukes i stedet for vestlige sifre.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende den <> </> *>-egenskapen til en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som NLS språk-IDen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> La oss for eksempel si at du oppretter en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet ved å sende strengen "ar-eksempel" til en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>konstruktør.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Hvis du sender den <> </> *> egenskap av objektet <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>sammen med.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*> method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: til den <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>metoden og arabisk leses sifre som skal erstatte vestlige sifre gangen for visning.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the method to be used for digit substitution.
trans-unit.target: Henter metoden som brukes til Siffererstatning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration value that specifies how to substitute characters in a string that cannot be displayed because they are not supported by the current font.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir hvordan du vil bytte ut tegn i en streng som ikke kan vises fordi de ikke støttes av gjeldende skrift.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Kaller avhending tillater ressursene som brukes av dette <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>objektet som tildeles på nytt til andre formål.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplisting som inneholder informasjon om formatering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> opplisting som inneholder informasjon om formatering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en generisk standard <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic default instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en generisk standardforekomsten av <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>klasse.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| If you make changes to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object returned from the GenericDefault property, these changes persist, and future calls to the GenericDefault property reflects these changes.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| Hvis du gjør endringer i den <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>objektet som ble returnert fra egenskapen GenericDefault beholde disse endringene, og fremtidige kall til egenskapen GenericDefault gjenspeiler disse endringene.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Generell standard <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en generell typografiske <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic typographic instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser opprinnelige verdier for en generisk typografiske forekomst av <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>klassen.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|24580 (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> and <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|&24580; (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>og <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En generell typografiske <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter kategorien stopper for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a text line and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Antall mellomrom mellom begynnelsen på en tekstlinje og første tabulator.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances (in number of spaces) between tab stops.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med avstander (i antall mellomrom) mellom stopper.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> objekt for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: In a graphical user interface, a hot key is the underlined letter in a word (usually combined with another key, such as the Alt key) that you can press on the keyboard to activate the functionality that the word represents.
trans-unit.target: I et grafisk brukergrensesnitt er hurtigtast understreket bokstav i ord (vanligvis kombineres med en annen nøkkelen, for eksempel Alt-tasten) som du kan trykke på tastaturet for å aktivere funksjonaliteten som representerer ordet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object, the default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> objekt for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet, standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den loddrette justeringen av strengen.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> to specify the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>til å angi vannrett justering av strengen.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that represents the vertical line alignment.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> opplisting som representerer linje loddrette justering.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the language and method to be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Angir språket og metoden som skal brukes når lokale sifre som brukes i stedet for vestlige sifre.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: En National språket støtte (NLS) språk-IDen som angir språket som skal brukes når lokale sifre som brukes i stedet for vestlige sifre.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> to the SetDigitSubstitution method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende den <> </> *>-egenskapen til en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som NLS språk-IDen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> La oss for eksempel si at du oppretter en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet ved å sende strengen "ar-eksempel" til en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>konstruktør.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Hvis du sender den <> </> *> for som <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt sammen med <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> til metoden SetDigitSubstitution deretter arabisk leses sifre som skal erstatte vestlige sifre gangen for visning.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: An element of the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration that specifies how digits are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Et element av den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan sifre vises.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that represent the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: Angir en matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> strukturer som representerer områder tegn målt av et kall til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: Setting more than 32 character ranges is not allowed and will cause an <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Angi mer enn 32 tegn områder er ikke tillatt og vil forårsake en <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that specifies the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> strukturer som angir områder tegn målt av et kall til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: More than 32 character ranges are set.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn 32 tegn områder er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Sets tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Angir tabulatortegn for denne <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Each tab-stop offset in the `tabStops` array, except the first one, is relative to the previous one.
trans-unit.target: Hver tabulator forskyvning i den `tabStops` matrise, bortsett fra den første som står i forhold til det tidligere.

trans-unit.source: The first tab-stop offset is relative to the initial offset position specified by `firstTabOffset`.
trans-unit.target: Første tabulator forskyvningen er i forhold til den opprinnelige forskyvningen plasseringen angitt av `firstTabOffset`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the initial offset position is 8 and the first tab-stop offset is 50, then the first tab stop is at position 58.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den opprinnelige forskyvningen posisjonen 8 og forskyvningen av første tabulator er for eksempel 50, er den første tabulatoren i posisjon 58.

trans-unit.source: If the initial offset position is zero, then the first tab-stop offset is relative to position 0, the string origin.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den opprinnelige forskyvningen posisjonen er null, er den første tabulator forskyvningen relative posisjon 0, kommer fra streng.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a line of text and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Antall mellomrom mellom begynnelsen på en tekstlinje og den første kategorien stoppe.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances between tab stops in the units specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med avstander mellom kategorien stopper i enheter angitt av den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> -objekt til en lesbar streng.

trans-unit.source: Only the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A> property is converted.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>egenskapen konverteres.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En strengrepresentasjon av dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> -nummerering for dette <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration that indicates how text drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object is trimmed when it exceeds the edges of the layout rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan teksten tegnes med denne <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> objektet beskjæres når den overskrider kantene for rektangelet oppsettet.
